basics.name: Yukun Tian
basics.label: Undergraduate
basics.summary: New Researcher in Scientific Community | Hands-on Enthusiast | Robotics Dev | IEEE/CCF Student Member | ACGN Lover | Amateur Photographer

work.name: School of Artificial Intelligence, Southeast University
work.summary: I am now working in the Key Laboratory of New Generation Artificial Intelligence Technology & Its Interdisciplinary Applications and Jiangsu Provincial Key Laboratory of Network and Information Security, under the supervise of Professor Hao Chen and Professor Ruiting Zhou.

work.name: 3SE Robot Team, Southeast University
work.summary: I am now leading the R&D of my school's Robot Team. (Mainly on vision tasks üëÅ).

work.name: NAIE department, Huawei Nanjing Research & Development Center
work.summary: I worked in the AI Model and Training Service Group where I mainly focused on operators dev for Ascend and CANN.

volunteer.organization: Southeast University Education Foundation, Rongjiang No.1 Middle School
volunteer.summary: I volunteered to teach in remote and underdeveloped areas during the summer vacation, aiming to spread the knowledge and ideas to a wider region, providing support for the rural revitalization strategy with the energy of young talents.
highlights: Nominated for the Top Ten Social Practice Awards at Southeast University
Xinhuanet and other authoritative media have reported on this, with over 56,000 total views

volunteer.organization: Guangzhou Huadu District Center for Disease Prevention and Control
volunteer.summary: The activity included volunteer services, Spring Festival visits and in-depth interviews. Team members assisted the elderly, collaborated with local authorities for festive outreach and we designed two new products to better assist elderly patients in their daily lives.
highlights: First Prize in the Social Practice Competition at Southeast University (3%), Outstanding Individual Award, Outstanding Team Award
Extensive media coverage across newspapers, television, and online news platforms, with over 42,000 total views
Obtain authorizations for two utility model patents

awards.title: 2023 13th China Educational Robot Competition Regular Season & Challenge (As Team Captain)
awards.awarder: National Special Prize & National First Prize
awards.summary: As the team captain, I was responsible for the development of core motion control algorithms and path planning algorithms for the robot, as well as designing solutions and managing work distribution and personnel.

awards.title: 2022 12th China Educational Robot Competition Regular Season & Challenge (As Team Captain)
awards.awarder: National Special Prize & National First Prize
awards.summary: As the team captain, I was responsible for the development of core motion control algorithms and path planning algorithms for the robot, as well as designing solutions and managing work distribution and personnel.

awards.title: RoboMaster 2024 Super Combat Competition (Eastern Region)
awards.summary: As one of the technical team leaders, I was responsible for the development of robot vision algorithms and part of the automatic striking functions, including pose estimation, object detection, and motion prediction.

awards.title: RoboMaster 2023 University League Competition (Jiangsu Station) 3V3 Combat
awards.summary: As a member of the electronic control and embedded systems team, I was responsible for improving the motion control algorithms of the robot and parameter tunning.

awards.title: RoboMaster 2024 University League Competition (Shanghai Station) 3V3 Combat
awards.summary: As one of the technical team leaders, I was responsible for the development of robot vision algorithms and part of the automatic striking functions, including pose estimation, object detection, and motion prediction.

awards.title: 2023 National English Writing Competition for College Students
2023 National English Competition for College Students

publications.name: EventAug: Multifaceted Spatio-Temporal Data Augmentation Methods for Event-based Learning
publications.summary: More information please refer to Publication page.

references.name: Professor Hao Chen
references.reference: Associate Professor in the Key Laboratory of New Generation Artificial Intelligence Technology&Its Interdisciplinary Applications, one of my advisors in the Southeast University.

references.name: Professor Ruiting Zhou
references.reference: Professor in the Jiangsu Provincial Key Laboratory of Network and Information Security, one of my advisors in the Southeast University.

projects.name: Event Information-Guided Multimodal Fusion Video Camouflage Object Detection Method
projects.summary: As the leading researcher, I am responsible for the overall project development and technical solution design. I have already submitted a paper as the first author to NeurIPS 2024 (CCFA).
highlights: Ministry of Education Key Laboratory Open Project for Young Scholars

projects.name: Design of an Autonomous Decision-Making Navigation and Precision Strike Robot Based on Laser SLAM and Machine Vision
projects.summary: As a core team member, I am responsible for robot motion control, embedded development, and part of the computer vision algorithm development. This project received an excellent rating during the conclusion acceptance defense.

projects.name: High-Performance Heterogeneous Collaborative Computing System for Mobile CPUs and GPUs for Complex Deep Neural Networks
projects.summary: As the primary responsible researcher, I am in charge of the overall technical solution design and algorithm development. We are planning to submit our work to MobiCom (CCFA) in August.
highlights: Student Research Training Project of Jiangsu Province

projects.name: Design and Application of Motion Target Identification and Prediction Models for Low-Latency Scenarios
projects.summary: As a core team member, I am responsible for the development of computer vision algorithms, model training and fine-tuning, and low-latency deployment on the robots.
highlights: Student Research Training Project of Jiangsu Province
